about_the_game:
Agent Heart: Deception is an adult visual novel experience where your choices matter and navigates the path for the protagonist, Steve Heart. Guide Steve along to safety on his mission and possibly get rewarded along the way.

The first installment of Agent Heart will introduce you to three of the main characters in the plot, and as the player your job is to lead Steve along with your choices to move the plot along. Some choices mean certain death, and others can change the outcomes of future events. Version 1.1 will be followed by two major updates before the game is available as a full release.

Your job is to follow Agent Heart and make some crucial choices for him to avoid getting caught on his missions. Your choices will also determine the ending for Steve and his girls. Choose between options when presented to you and watch the story unfold from there. 

Features:

- 15 Achievements

- 2 possible endings, a few ways of getting there, and many ways to die.

- High Definition 3D renders

- Thousands of lines of dialogue.

- Full ambient sound and music.

- Multiple story paths.

- Explicit animated sex scenes (NSFW)

- Mouse or keyboard control

content_descriptors.notes: This product contains explicit sexual acts as well as some depictions of violence. All scenarios are consensual and contain adult characters.

The first installment of Agent Heart will introduce you to three of the main characters in the plot, and as the player your job is to lead Steve along with your choices to move the plot along. Some choices mean certain death, and others can change the outcomes of future events. Version 1.1 will be followed by two major updates before the game is available as a full release.

Your job is to follow Agent Heart and make some crucial choices for him to avoid getting caught on his missions. Your choices will also determine the ending for Steve and his girls. Choose between options when presented to you and watch the story unfold from there.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 of Kernel 3.x+
  • Processor: 1.5 GHZ or higher Pentium 4 CPU or equivalent
  • Graphics: 128mb DirectX 9.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit DirectX compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10+
  • Graphics: 128mb DirectX 9.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit DirectX compatible

name: Agent Heart: Deception

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista/7/8/10/11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHZ or higher Pentium 4 CPU or equivalent
  • Graphics: 128mb DirectX 9.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit DirectX compatible

short_description: Join Agent Steve Heart, an experimental augmented military operative, in a thrilling episode of deception, mystery, action, and seduction. Embrace your fate and experience an unforgettable journey filled with relentless challenges and the promise of future conflicts.
